content: @Grahame Grieve Could 'proprietary' constraints be highlighted or put in their own section or made bold or something in the resulting HTML (or remove the standard ones)? I see that eg. both https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-core/StructureDefinition-ch-core-composition-patient-epr.html#constraints and https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core/StructureDefinition-dk-core-patient.html#constraints have defined constraints but they sort of drown in all the other ones from the standard.
so I took all of the inherited ones out, and then people squawked so I put them back in
Can they be tagged or grouped, maybe as core, inherited but not core, and local?
